SkyKnight:




SkyKnight chuckled lightly, and replied into his comm to Blazer's 
quarters: "I'm surprised that you didn't complain. I'll see you when 
we get back." He stood up and walked to find Berserk and Techy.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Blazer::
> 
> Blazer frowns, recieving Sky Knight's transmission. He didn't like 
the idea 
> of taking Berserk to somewhere populated, but Berserk was probably 
as ready 
> as he was ever going to be.
> 
> "Allright," Blazer says, "If anything goes out of controll, report 
> immediately."
